metadata.name: Monks of Rinpung Dzong
metadata.description:
An assembly of monks at the Rinpung Dzong Monastery in Paro, Bhutan. Built in 1646 and one of the largest monasteries, the Rinpung Dzong was reconsecrated and established as the administrative and monastic centre of the western region. 

License - Extended Editorial. Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.
